comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Course sponsored by the Allemite Corporation and held at Carr Buick. Accompanying note: "Mrs. E.T. Bass loosens oil drain plug. Mrs. William R. McCallister watches."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment._content: They can repair cars but they can't have their own first names, alas. Nice set.
